verbose_text: We found that following exposure to OGD or H 2 O 2, the knockdown of Srxn1 significantly increased cell death as determined by MTS and LDH assays, increased cell apoptosis as measured by Hoechst 33342 and Annexin V-FITC/PI staining.
evidence: Srxn1 significantly increased cell death as determined by MTS and LDH assays, increased cell apoptosis
